names.english: special pill to massage the lower back (topical)
names.commonEnglish: Special Pill to Massage the Lower Back

actions: Disperses Cold and Dampness, warms the channels and stops pain.
With Gan Jiang, for Cold-Damp Bi.
With Rou Gui, for Damp-Cold Bi in the channels with generalized aches and pains and difficulty rotating the trunk.
Expels Wind-Dampness, disperses Cold, warms and activates the channels and stops pain.
Reduces swelling and alleviates pain topically.
Clears Heat, relieves toxicity and prevents putrefaction.
Dispels Wind-Dampness seeping into the Lower Jiao.
Warms the Kidneys and assists Yang.
Invigorates the Blood, dissipates masses, reduces swellings, detoxifies, opens the channels and alleviates pain.

syndromes: Cold Damp in the Lower Jiao

symptoms: Cold pain in the lower back and body
Extreme heavy sensation in the lower back

notes: Apply 3g of the powder, diluted in Ginger Juice Jiang Zhi to the lumbar area and massage until it feels hot, then bandage.
